Mansur Muhammad Dan Ali (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye agha Naịjirịa lara ezumike nká na onye bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke Naịjirị nke Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara na Nọvemba n'afọ 2015.
A mụrụ Dan-Ali na Ọgọst 25, na afọ 1959 na Zamfara Steeti

Ọ gara Birnin Magaji Town Primary School afọ (1966 -1972) maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya na Government Secondary School, Shinkafi (1972-1977) maka agụmakmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya. Ọ natara Higher National Diploma (HND) ya na Photogrammetric na Surveying site na Kaduna Polytechnic (1977-1982) ma nwee nzere masta na Public Policy and Administration (MPPA) site na Mahadum Bayero Kano (2004-2005) na nzere masta n'ihe ọmụmụ nchekwa site na Machịkwa Bangladesh (2009).

E nyere Dan Ali ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke abụọ na ndị agha Naịjirịa na afọ 1984 site na Short Service Commission na Nigerian Defence Academy. Dan-Ali jere ozi n'ọchịchị na ikike ndị ọrụ dị iche iche, ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere ịhazi ndị agha Naijiria na-akwado United Nations Africa Hybrid Mission na Sudan
Dan Ali nọ na Directing Staff nke Armed Forces Command and Staff College, Jaji site na afọ 2003 -2005 ma bụrụ Chief Instructor (CI) na Nigerian Defence Academy na afọ 2010
Ọ bụkwa onye na-anọchite anya onye nduzi ọzụzụ agha tupu e zigara ya na Ngalaba Nhazi nke Ministry of Defence dị ka osote onye nduzi
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ndị agha Naijiria n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013.
Ndị Senate Naịjirịa kwadoro Dan Ali dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015 ma bụrụ Minista na Nọvemba n'afọ 2015.
